title: iPOD Cloner v1.13 build 828
description:
Just one click, Convert all DVD Movies to iPod directly! 

*Directly transports DVD files from PC to iPod without iTunes! 

*Supports the conversion of latest DVD movies 

*Supports iPod Nano and Classic 

*Faster and easier to use.( up to 400%) 

*Built-in CSS decrypting 

*Removes region codes 


Why choose iPod-Cloner 

iPod-Cloner is very easy to use
Just one click, you can clone all DVD Movies to iPod directly with iPod-Cloner without iTunes. 


iPod-Cloner has high speed 
The conversion from DVD to iPod is very quickly(up to 400%), save a lot of time for you.


iPod-Cloner supports all DVD file 
iPod-Cloner can transports all the files, including music, video, movies and TV shows from PC to iPod. iPod-Cloner also supports latest DVD Movies conversion.


iPod-Cloner can clone protected DVD 
iPod-Cloner has built-in CSS decryption and region decoder. You can convert protected DVD to iPod and remove region code. 


Features of iPod-Cloner 

iPod Files Manager
iPod-Cloner can easily transports all the files, including music, video, movies and TV shows from your computer to iPod. 


Directly transports DVDs to iPod, No iTunes
iPod-Cloner converts DVD to iPod MP4 (MPEG-4), Xvid,H264, MP3, AAC, M4A, etc. It can transport DVDs to iPod directly without iTunes.


Supports iPod Classic and Nano 
You can clone DVD to iPod Classic and iPod Nano directly with iPod-CLoner.


iPod-Cloner supports latest DVD movies
iPod-Cloner can converts the latest DVD movies, including Sony, Disney and New York DVDs


Faster and easier to use 
iPod-Cloner has absorbing working speed ( up to 400%).


Built-in CSS decrypting
iPod-Cloner can clone protected DVD to iPod based its built-in CSS decrypting.


The ability to remove region codes
iPod-Cloner can remove region codes. It can output PAL DVD to NTSC DVD, or output NTSC DVD to PAL DVD.


Chapter(s) converting
iPod-Cloner can clone any clip or segment to iPod.


Other smart utilities

Faster encoding module

Supports the adjustment of aspect ratio

Adds or removes borders

Optimized default settings

Supports preview input files 

Multi-language


System Requirements:

CPU: Pentium-II 450 MHz or faster processor 
Drive: DVD-ROM drive. 
Memory: 64MB of RAM 
Hard-disk: 500MB free hard disc space 

Enjoy
